title: Conservative conference: UK in period of adjustment after Brexit, says PM
content:
1. Conservative conference: UK in period of adjustment after Brexit, says PM  BBC News
  2. Boris Johnson: pig cull part of post-Brexit transition  Guardian News
  3. Johnson eyes post-COVID economy as UK Conservatives meet  The Washington Post
  4. For his sake, and Britain’s, now is the time for Boris Johnson to ride off into the sunset  The Guardian
  5. Boris Johnson's Lead in the Polls May Yet Evaporate as Crises Accumulate  Bloomberg
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: コンサバティブ・カンファレンス 英国はBrexit後の調整期間にある、と首相が語る
保守派会议。英国首相表示，英国在脱欧后处于调整期
保守派會議。英國首相表示，英國在脫歐後處於調整期
